column1: How would you concatenate strings in base R? (And how would the output differ from a stringr-solution?)
column2:
paste("a", "b", NA, NaN, NULL, factor("lalala"), character(0), sep = "")
#> [1] "abNANaNlalala"

Comment: stringr::str_c-does handle NAs more strictly than paste.

column1: Write df to a csv. Rehearse the most important arguments.
column2:
write.table(x, file = "", append = FALSE, quote = TRUE, sep = " ",
            eol = "\n", na = "NA", dec = ".", row.names = TRUE,
            col.names = TRUE, qmethod = c("escape", "double"),
            fileEncoding = "")
